---
title: "Examples"
---

This section is devoted to demonstrating the basic capabilities in Quarto. The examples focus mainly on how to:

- Create a basic template.
- Display images, tables, code.
- Without an attached language, without Python and R.

By clicking on `</> Code > View Source`, it's possible to view the source code of the qmd file generating this page.

- [No Code](example.qmd): no code cells.
- [Python](example_py.qmd): using Python code cells.
- [R](example_r.qmd): using R code cells.
